News.Title: Arisinfra Gets ACUITE BBB Rating for Rs. 150 Cr Facilities
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions receives ACUITE BBB stable rating for Rs. 150 Cr bank facilities. Company shows strong growth with revenues rising to Rs. 724.11 Cr in 9M FY26 from Rs. 546.52 Cr in 9M FY25.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Promoter Group Sells 2.57% Stake
News.Summary: Shivanand Shankar Mankekar HUF and family members dispose of 20,96,512 shares worth 2.57% stake in Arisinfra Solutions through open market transactions, reducing their collective holding to 8.69%.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions grants 17,755 ESOPs worth ₹43.50 lakh
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited's Nomination and Remuneration Committee approved grant of 17,755 employee stock options amounting to ₹43,50,000 under ESOP-2024 scheme on January 30, 2026.

News.Title: ArisInfra Solutions Q3FY26 IPO Proceeds Report
News.Summary: ArisInfra Solutions submitted monitoring agency report for Q3FY26 showing utilization of INR 579.60 crore proceeds (Pre-IPO: INR 80.004 crore, IPO: INR 499.596 crore) with no material deviations.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Q3FY26 Results Show Strong Growth
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions reported Q3FY26 standalone revenue of ₹1,613.84 million, up 38.00% YoY, with net profit of ₹32.26 million versus loss of ₹57.20 million in Q3FY25.

News.Title: Arisinfra Secures ₹63 Crore Concrete Order
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited announces ₹63.00 crore ready-mix concrete order through subsidiary Buildmex from LD Patel Group, strengthening execution footprint in construction materials.

News.Title: Arisinfra Board Approves JV & Office Relocation
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited's board approved formation of joint venture with JS Infra Projects for asphalt business and relocated registered office within Mumbai on January 19, 2026.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Independent Director Resigns
News.Summary: Ravi Venkatraman steps down as Independent Director of Arisinfra Solutions Limited effective January 14, 2026, citing professional commitments and potential engagement with company subsidiary.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Secures ₹350 Crore Order
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited has received a significant order worth ₹350 crores, marking a major business development for the trading sector company.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Secures ₹735 Crore Asphalt Order
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited announced that its subsidiary Buildmex-Infra Private Limited has secured a significant asphalt order valued at approximately ₹735.00 crores from Goswami Infra Projects Private Limited.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Eyes India's ₹35,000+ Cr Asphalt Market
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions evaluates entry into India's substantial asphalt market valued at over ₹35,000 crores, marking potential expansion into infrastructure materials sector.

News.Title: Aris Infra Signs MoU to Enter ₹35,000 Cr Asphalt Market
News.Summary: Aris Infra Solutions Limited announces strategic MoU with JS Infra Solutions to explore collaboration in India's ₹35,000 crore asphalt and road infrastructure materials ecosystem through asset-light approach.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Director Manish Singh Resigns
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited announces resignation of Nominee Director Mr. Manish Kumar Singh effective December 17, 2025, citing pre-occupation as reason for departure.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Rejects ICRA Credit Rating
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited has declined to accept credit ratings assigned by ICRA Limited for its bank facilities, with the non-acceptance formally communicated to the rating agency on December 16, 2025.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Allots 3.33 Lakh Equity Shares Under ESOP Scheme
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited allotted 3,33,510 equity shares of Rs. 2 face value each following exercise of vested stock options under its Employee Stock Option Plan 2021. The allotment increases the company's paid-up share capital to Rs. 16,27,64,072 divided into 8,13,82,036 equity shares, with in-principle approvals already received from NSE and BSE.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Reports 38% Revenue Growth in Q2FY26 with Improved Working Capital Efficiency
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions achieved INR 241 crores revenue in Q2FY26 (38% YoY growth) with EBITDA margin of 9.34% and PAT of INR 15 crores versus loss of INR 2 crores last year, while reducing working capital cycle to 84 days from 114 days. The infrastructure supply and services company secured INR 850 crores integrated order book and expanded reserved manufacturing capacity to 9.5 million metric tons annually across 15 plants with 40% utilization.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Reports Q2 FY26 Results with Revenue of ₹709.50 Million
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited reported quarterly results for the quarter ended September 30, 2025. The company posted revenue from operations of ₹709.50 million and other income of ₹60.94 million. The company recorded a loss before tax of ₹138.85 million for the quarter. For the half-year period, revenue from operations stood at ₹1,287.05 million with other income of ₹95.50 million, resulting in a loss before tax of ₹68.60 million. The company completed its IPO of 2,25,04,324 equity shares at ₹222 per share, raising gross proceeds of ₹499.96 million. Net IPO proceeds of ₹461.42 million were received after estimated issue expenses of ₹38.54 million. The company operates in trading of construction materials as a single business segment. Basic earnings per share for the quarter was ₹1.76 and for the half-year was ₹2.17.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Reports No Deviation in IPO Proceeds Utilization for Quarter Ended September 2025
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited submitted its monitoring agency report for the quarter ended September 30, 2025, showing no deviation from the disclosed objects of its IPO issue. The company raised Rs. 499.596 crore through its IPO (June 18-20, 2025) and Rs. 80.004 crore through Pre-IPO placement, totaling Rs. 579.600 crore monitored by ICRA Limited. The IPO proceeds were allocated for repayment of borrowings (Rs. 204.600 crore), working capital requirements (Rs. 177.000 crore), investment in subsidiary Buildmex-Infra Private Limited (Rs. 48.000 crore), and general corporate purposes (Rs. 31.842 crore). During the quarter, the company utilized Rs. 248.842 crore from IPO proceeds and Rs. 16.632 crore from Pre-IPO proceeds. Unutilized funds of Rs. 37.298 crore from IPO and Rs. 13.858 crore from Pre-IPO were deployed in term deposits with Axis Bank earning 5.75-5.80% returns. The monitoring agency confirmed all utilization was in line with offer document disclosures, with no major deviations observed and all required approvals obtained.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Reports Mixed Financial Results for Quarter Ended September 30, 2025
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited announced its unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2025. The Board of Directors approved the results at a meeting held on November 7, 2025. On a standalone basis, the company reported revenue from operations of ₹709.50 million for the quarter, with other income of ₹60.94 million. The company recorded a loss before tax of ₹138.85 million for the quarter. On a consolidated basis, revenue from operations was ₹802.29 million for the quarter, with the group reporting a profit before tax of ₹187.61 million. The consolidated results include six subsidiaries: Buildmex Infra Private Limited, Aris Unitern Re Solutions Private Limited, Arisinfra Trading Private Limited, Arisinfra Reality Private Limited, Arisinfra Construction Materials Private Limited, and White Roots Infra Private Limited. The company completed its Initial Public Offering (IPO) during the period, raising gross proceeds of ₹499.96 million through the issuance of 22,50,434 equity shares at ₹222 per share. The shares were listed on NSE and BSE on June 25, 2025. The trading window for designated persons will open on November 10, 2025.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Reports Strong Q2 Performance with Revenue Jump to 2.4B Rupees
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions delivered robust quarterly results with revenue rising to 2.4 billion rupees from 1.7 billion rupees year-over-year. The company's EBITDA increased to 225 million rupees compared to 132 million rupees in the same period last year, while EBITDA margin improved to 9.34% from 7.56%. The company swung to a consolidated net profit of 143 million rupees versus a loss of 30 million rupees in the prior year period.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Schedules Earnings Conference Call for Q2H1 FY26 Results
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited will hold an earnings conference call on November 10, 2025, at 11:00 AM IST to discuss the company's Q2H1 FY26 financial performance, strategy and outlook. The call will cover standalone and consolidated unaudited financial results along with limited review report for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2025. Senior management will be present on the conference call for investors and analysts. The company describes itself as India's leading provider of integrated construction materials and services.

News.Title: Arisinfra Partners with Transcon Group and Amogaya Projects in ₹12,000 Crore Real Estate Deal
News.Summary: Arisinfra has entered into a partnership with Transcon Group and Amogaya Projects to unlock real estate value exceeding ₹12,000 crore. The company expects to generate additional EBITDA of ₹9.6 crore over the next 5 months. Under this arrangement, Arisinfra will handle complete project management and material supply for the ventures.

News.Title: ARSS Infra Secures ₹4.3 Billion Sub Contracts From Shivam Condev
News.Summary: ARSS Infra has secured sub contracts worth ₹4.3 billion from Shivam Condev.

News.Title: ARSS Infra Secures Sub Contracts Worth 1.65 Billion Rupees
News.Summary: ARSS Infra has secured sub contracts valued at 1.65 billion rupees. The announcement indicates new business wins for the infrastructure company.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Helps Transcon Developers Secure Occupation Certificate for 158,000 Sq. Ft. Commercial Space
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions assisted Transcon Developers in obtaining an occupation certificate for 158,000 square feet at 'Transcon Ramdev Plaza'. The certification unlocks commercial potential exceeding ₹1,000 crore for the development.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Reclassifies Authorized Share Capital, Converts Preference Shares to Equity
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited amended its Memorandum of Association to reclassify authorized share capital by converting compulsorily convertible preference shares into equity shares. The amendment was approved at the company's 4th Annual General Meeting held on September 29, 2025, based on the Scrutinizer's Report dated September 30, 2025. Following the reclassification, the company's authorized share capital remains ₹22,30,00,000, comprising ₹22,22,38,000 divided into 11,11,19,000 equity shares of ₹2 each and ₹7,62,000 divided into 76,200 preference shares of ₹10 each. The change required consequent alteration to the Capital Clause of the company's Memorandum of Association.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Approves Incorporation of Five Wholly Owned Subsidiaries in Mumbai
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited's management committee approved the incorporation of five wholly owned subsidiaries in Mumbai, India on September 24, 2025. The subsidiaries are ArisRock Private Limited (stone, gravel, crushed rock materials), ArisMix Private Limited (ready-mix concrete, batching, delivery), ArisCore Private Limited (core structural materials for construction), ArisBond Private Limited (admixtures, bonding agents, curing chemicals, AAC/solid blocks), and ArisEdge Private Limited (paints, coatings, tiles, surface finishes). The company will hold 100% shareholding in each subsidiary through cash consideration. The incorporation is part of the company's expansion strategy to facilitate growth of business operations. Ministry of Corporate Affairs approval is required for the company incorporation documents, with capital infusion planned post-incorporation.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Secures ₹40 Crore Development Management Contract from AVS Housing
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited has been awarded a Development Management Mandate by AVS Housing and Construction LLP, replacing a previous agreement with its subsidiary ArisUnitern RE Solutions Private Limited. The contract has a revenue potential of approximately ₹40 crore and covers development management, project execution, and material supply services. The mandate is expected to be executed over approximately 2 to 3 years. All terms and conditions remain unchanged except for the change in contracting parties. The agreement does not involve any related party transactions or promoter group interests.

News.Title: Arisinfra Co and Vaishnavi Residences Launch Arsh Greens Villa Plot Community in Bengaluru
News.Summary: Arisinfra Co and Vaishnavi Residences have launched Arsh Greens, a residential project featuring exclusive villa plots located within Bengaluru city limits.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Launches Merusri Sunscape Villa Community in Bengaluru with ₹250 Crore Development Value
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited announced the launch of Merusri Sunscape, a luxury villa community in Bengaluru, through its subsidiary ArisUnitern RE Solutions in partnership with Merusri Developers. The project spans 5.5 acres on IVC Road with a total development area of 275,000 sq. ft. and saleable area of 235,000 sq. ft., carrying a Gross Development Value exceeding ₹250 crore. The development comprises 76 exclusive villas ranging from 2,410 to 3,850 sq. ft. in 3BHK and 4BHK configurations, with 52 units released in Phase 1. The project has achieved complete financial closure with funding from Aditya Birla, and home loan approvals from major banks including SBI and Tata Capital. Construction is expected to complete within 30 to 36 months. Arisinfra will manage the entire project lifecycle including execution, sales, and customer relationship management.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions' Subsidiary Secures Two Development Management Contracts Worth ₹91 Crore
News.Summary: ArisUnitern RE Solutions Private Limited, a subsidiary of Arisinfra Solutions Limited, has secured two development management mandates totaling approximately ₹91 crore. The first contract worth ₹35 crore was awarded by Eternity Structures Private Limited for a 3-year period, while the second contract worth ₹56 crore was secured from Vaishnavi Residencies for 2-3 years. Both contracts involve development management, project execution, and material supply services through the company's integrated delivery model. The contracts are with domestic entities and do not involve any related party transactions or promoter group interests.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Secures ₹100 Crore Orders in North Bengaluru, Total Order Book Reaches ₹850 Crore
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited secured ₹100 crore worth of integrated supply and services contracts from Arsh Greens and Eternity Group in North Bengaluru. The orders cover plotted developments, villas, and apartments with execution horizons of 24-30 months. The company's North Bengaluru portfolio now spans over 2.45 million sq. ft. with a Gross Development Value of ₹1,400 crore. The new contracts include ₹50 crore in execution services and ₹50 crore in material supply. With these additions, Arisinfra's total integrated supply-and-services order book has increased to nearly ₹850 crore, with ₹750 crore secured post-listing. The company's services arm historically delivers gross margins of over 50%. All project approvals are in place, with Arsh Greens launching immediately and other projects commencing within 90 days.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Reports Record Sales for Bodhii Tree Villa Plot Development
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions achieved record sales for its Bodhii Tree Villa Plot Development project located near NH-75.

News.Title: ArisInfra Solutions Reports Strong Q1 FY26 Results with 9.2% EBITDA Margin and Debt-Free Status
News.Summary: ArisInfra Solutions Limited reported solid quarterly results with total income of Rs. 216 crores, up 11% year-on-year. The company achieved several milestones including EBITDA of Rs. 19.5 crores (9.2% margin), becoming debt-free with net debt at zero, and reducing working capital cycle to 97 days from 120 days. Net profit stood at Rs. 5.11 crores after absorbing Rs. 2.5 crores of IPO-related expenses. Adjusted for these expenses, PAT was Rs. 8 crores compared to Rs. 6.5 crores in Q1 last year. The company has gross debt of Rs. 113 crores against cash of Rs. 377 crores. Management expects 30-40% revenue growth going forward, with PAT margins of 4-6% and plans to further reduce working capital cycle to 85-90 days. The company recently secured new contracts worth Rs. 400-450 crores and expanded its BuildMex subsidiary capacity to 2.5-3 lakh metric tons monthly.

News.Title: ArisUnitern RE Solutions Secures ₹40 Crore Development Management Contract from AVS Housing
News.Summary: ArisUnitern RE Solutions Private Limited, a subsidiary of Arisinfra Solutions Limited, has secured a Development Management Mandate worth approximately ₹40 crore from AVS Housing and Construction LLP. The contract involves development management, project execution, and material supply services through an integrated delivery model. The mandate is expected to be executed over approximately 2 to 3 years. The contract is with a domestic entity and does not involve any related party transactions or promoter group interests.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Reports No Deviation in IPO Proceeds Utilization for June 2025 Quarter
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited submitted its monitoring agency report for the quarter ended June 30, 2025, showing proper utilization of IPO proceeds without any deviation from stated objectives. The company raised INR 499.596 crore through its IPO in June 2025 and INR 80.004 crore through pre-IPO placement. ICRA Limited, the monitoring agency, confirmed no deviation from the objects of the issue. During the quarter, the company utilized INR 213.456 crore from IPO proceeds, primarily for debt repayment (INR 203.185 crore), working capital funding (INR 9.021 crore), and subsidiary investment (INR 1.250 crore). From pre-IPO proceeds, INR 14.469 crore was used for administrative expenses. The remaining unutilized funds totaling INR 286.140 crore from IPO and INR 30.490 crore from pre-IPO are deployed in term deposits and bank accounts. All projects remain on schedule with no delays reported in implementation.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Secures ₹40 Cr+ Development Management Mandate from AVS Group
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Ltd., through its subsidiary ArisUnitern RE Solutions Private Limited, has secured a Development Management mandate from AVS Housing and Construction LLP for Rudraksh Towers – Wing A, a residential development in Mulund, Mumbai. The mandate has a revenue potential exceeding ₹40 crore with substantial margin upside through the company's integrated delivery model combining development management, project execution, and material supply. CEO Srinivasan Gopalan stated this strengthens their position in Mumbai's real estate market and reflects growing demand for integrated partners handling capital, execution, and procurement. This represents the company's third project in Mumbai and demonstrates their ability to provide money, material, and management through a single platform.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Reports Q1 Loss, Approves Auditor Reappointments and Committee Changes
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited's Board approved unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. The company reported a standalone loss of Rs. 47.82 million compared to a loss of Rs. 1.39 million in the same quarter last year, with revenue from operations declining to Rs. 1,260.94 million from Rs. 1,410.19 million. On a consolidated basis, the company posted a profit of Rs. 51.12 million versus Rs. 64.56 million in the previous year quarter. The Board recommended reappointment of M/s. Malay Shah & Associates as Secretarial Auditors for five years (FY 2025-26 to FY 2029-30) subject to shareholder approval, and approved reappointment of M/s. Aman A. Jain & Associates as Internal Auditors for FY 2025-26. The company reconstituted its Stakeholders Relationship Committee, appointing CFO Bhavik Jayesh Khara as a member following the resignation of Independent Director Ravi Venkatraman. The Board also approved convening the 4th Annual General Meeting. During the quarter, the company completed its IPO of 2,25,04,324 equity shares at Rs. 222 per share, raising gross proceeds of Rs. 4,995.96 million, with shares listed on NSE and BSE on June 25, 2025.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Reports Mixed Q1 Results with Revenue Growth but Lower Net Profit
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions reported quarterly results showing revenue growth to 2.12 billion rupees from 1.9 billion rupees year-over-year. EBITDA increased to 183 million rupees from 146 million rupees, with EBITDA margin improving to 8.63% from 7.67%. However, consolidated net profit declined to 33 million rupees compared to 61 million rupees in the same period last year.

News.Title: Arisinfra's Subsidiary ArisUnitern Completes 268,000 Sq. Ft. Chennai Residential Project in 24 Months
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Ltd. announced that its subsidiary ArisUnitern RE Solutions Pvt. Ltd. has successfully completed a residential project in Chennai and received the Completion Certificate. The 268,000 square feet project features five residential towers with 185 units and was delivered within 24 months of commencement. The project was originally conceived by a previous developer but construction had stalled. Investcorp, a global alternative investment firm and the project's lender, appointed ArisUnitern to take over and complete the project. Work commenced in January 2023 and was completed in July 2025. Arisinfra and its subsidiaries generated approximately ₹34 crores in combined revenues from services and material supply during the project. The completion demonstrates Arisinfra's integrated delivery model combining project services and material supply capabilities.

News.Title: ARISINFRA Partners With House of W to Add ₹300 Crore Sanitaryware Production Capacity
News.Summary: ARISINFRA has partnered with House of W to add over ₹300 crore annual production capacity for sanitaryware. The partnership aims to enhance project execution and strengthen supply chain relationships with local and global brands. This move supports the company's order book that exceeds ₹750 crore and includes new major real estate developments.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Secures ₹340 Crore Construction Materials Contract from Transcon Group
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions Limited has been awarded a contract worth approximately ₹340 crore by Transcon Group for end-to-end supply of construction materials. The contract covers supply of Ready-Mix Concrete, Steel, Cement, Chemicals, Plumbing, Electrical, and Finishing Products for Transcon's ongoing residential and commercial projects in Mumbai. The contract will be executed over 45-50 months, providing strong revenue visibility for Arisinfra. The Transcon Group includes Transcon Iconica Private Limited, Transcon Bellaviu Private Limited, and Shraddha Shelters Private Limited. This is a domestic contract with no related party transactions involved.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Secures Contract from Transcon Group in Mumbai
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions has received a contract from Transcon Group for work in Mumbai. No additional details about the contract value, scope, or timeline were provided.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Signs MoU with Wadhwa Construction for Material Supplies
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Wadhwa Construction. The agreement is expected to contribute 750 million rupees to material supplies over a period of 36-40 months.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Signs Supply Agreement with Wadhwa Construction
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions has entered into an agreement with Wadhwa Construction to provide material supplies worth 750 million rupees. The supply agreement is set to span over the next 36-40 months.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions: Q1 Loss Narrows, Revenue Grows
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions reported a Q1 FY2025 consolidated net loss of Rs 1.36 crore, improved from Rs 19.94 crore loss in Q1 FY2024. Total income increased to Rs 224.21 crore from Rs 207.55 crore year-over-year. For FY2025, the company posted a net profit of Rs 2.06 crore, with total income rising to Rs 781.98 crore.

News.Title: Arisinfra Solutions Reports Q4 Financial Results
News.Summary: Arisinfra Solutions has reported its Q4 financial results. The company achieved an EBITDA profit of 101 million rupees, compared to a loss of 98 million rupees in the same quarter last year. The Q4 EBITDA margin stands at 4.57%. Revenue for Q4 increased to 2.2 billion rupees from 2 billion rupees in the previous year. Despite the improved EBITDA, the company still reported a net loss of 14 million rupees in Q4, which is a significant reduction from the 199 million rupee loss in the same period last year.

News.Title: Arisinfra Project Valued at ₹288 Crore
News.Summary: Arisinfra has announced a project with a Gross Development Value of ₹288 Crore. The company's current market capitalization stands at ₹1300 Crore.

News.Title: Arisinfra's Unit Wins ₹100 Crore Project in Bangalore
News.Summary: Arisinfra's subsidiary, Arisunitern Re Solutions, has secured a major project in Bangalore's Nandi Hills. This new project has increased the company's order book by ₹100 crore.
